title: Anurag Kashyap slams Vijay Subramaniam for ‘Made-in-AI’ film on Hanuman: ‘You should be in the gutter’
description: Anurag Kashyap slams Vijay Subramaniam for ‘Made-in-AI’ film on Hanuman: ‘You should be in the gutter’. Kashyap criticised Subramaniam, producer and founder of the Collective Artists Network, for using artificial intelligence in his upcoming film 'Chiranjeevi Hanuman – The Eternal'
content: Filmmaker Anurag Kashyap has joined the general public in slamming producer Vijay Subramaniam for his new film venture. On Tuesday, Subramaniam announced that a film on the Hindu deity Hanuman is in production and scheduled to hit the screens in Apri... [1639 chars]

title: Asian shares retreat, tracking tech losses on Wall Street
description: Asian shares have retreated, tracking a decline on Wall Street led by technology shares including Nvidia and other stars that have been riding the mania surrounding artificial-intelligence.

title: Thai data centre capacity may triple on surging demand for AI
description: Thailand’s data centre capacity is expected to triple in the next three years as investments of about US$6.5 billion pour into the sector to meet surging demand for cloud computing and artificial intelligence (AI).
content:

title: Who Is Mary Ann Davidson? Oracle's Security Chief Quits After Nearly 40 Years Amid Company Reorganisation
description: Mary Ann Davidson, Oracle’s longtime Chief Security Officer (CSO), is leaving the company after nearly four decades of service. According to Bloomberg, Davidson has been "one of the highest-ranking women in the cybersecurity industry." Her exit comes as part of a wider reorganisation at Oracle, with the company reportedly cutting jobs to rein in costs amid heavy investment in artificial intelligence infrastructure, the Bloomberg report added, citing a person familiar with the matter.
content: Davidson's official profile on Oracle's website highlights her role representing the company on the board of the Information Technology Information Sharing and Analysis Center. It also notes her service on the international board of the Information S... [1592 chars]

title: Polar bear waltz: Fake Trump-Putin AI images shroud Ukraine peace effort
description: WASHINGTON — From a fake image of Donald Trump and Vladimir Putin dancing in the snow with a polar bear to a fabricated photo of European leaders waiting somberly outside the Oval Office, artificial intelligence (AI) enabled disinformation has clouded the diplomatic push to end the war in Ukraine.
